title: Rand Paul says most powers should be returned to states
content: Sen. Rand Paul, R-Kentucky, said Thursday he thinks his call for smaller and less intrusive federal government that returns most powers to the states is beginning to resonate with voters.He said he did well in Wednesday night’s Republican debate and wants more such events that give him the chance to show voters he’s the outsider, not the majority of the other GOP presidential candidates.And he took a shot at current front-runner Donald Trump as well: “If we keep having debates, maybe people will come to their senses and realize we don’t need an entertainer.”“I think I ticked him off,” Paul  …
